resources.string: Turn the map in driving direction
Set this zoom level at long press on minus button
Set this zoom level at long press on plus button
Show zoom buttons at bottom side
Show blue disk indicator like Google Map
Screen will be automatically turned off in case of inactivity
Screen will not be turned off while you see map
Hide window title with map name and etc
Hide status bar in map mode
Switch off check of the size and datetime map files
Slow updating saves the battery theoretically
On this zoom traffic info are unavailable

v.0.6.3
 + Turning map in driving direction
 + Added russian localisation + Update Yandex.Map URL
 
 v.0.6.2
 - Fix bug long time loading sqlite cash file
 
 v.0.6.1
 + Add support cash files in sqlite format created by TrekBuddy Atlas Creator. Creation of files became easier. Indexation now is not required. More information at my website
 + Update Google.Map URL
 + Change max zoom level of Google.Map from 18 to 20
 
 v.0.6.0
 + First version of search. Test it please and write to me.
 - Bug fix
 
 v.0.5.5
 + Compass on the map
 + About dialog
 + What's new dialog
v.0.5.4 + Enable/Disable auto-follow mode + Top/Bottom position of zoom buttons + Center and Zoom in on double tap map + Predefined zoom value for long press on zoom buttons
v.0.5.3 + Network provider usage while gps it is not ready yet + Status current provider in window title (test look) + Fast\slow update current location + Switch off auto reindexing (if you had problems after reboot)
v.0.5.2 + Update Google.Map URL + Support png images in tar files + Monitoring GPS turn on/off + Disconnecting from GPS at window turning off
